Title: Criminalizes the operation of a school bus by a person having any amount of alcohol in his or her blood and providing sanctions for violations
Summary: Criminalizes the operation of a school bus by a person having any amount of alcohol in his or her blood and provides sanctions for violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to criminalizing the operation of a school bus by a person having any amount of alcohol in his or her blood and providing sanctions for violations
